page.title: 09A Day in the Life:-
page.content:
Saturday was the day of the wedding. I woke up very happy.I looked at my watch,it was 8.15.a.m.I jumped out of bed and ran down stairs.My mum and sister and dog were having breakfast. After breakfast I had a bath and washed my hair .We got into the car.It was a fair drive to our dad's house.We picked him up and then went to the wedding. After the wedding we all had our picture taken then went to the school fete.Me,my dad,and my sister came home at 4.30.After we had a wash we went to the disco.It was 8.30.p.m. and we had some food.We had a dance and some more drink.It was 12.00.when we came home.We went straight to bed.
Pupil-St.Thomas More School.
